title: Fiora Skin Idea
body: {{champion:114}} She has so little skins I thought it would be cool to have her sword be french bread so maybe like a "Baker Fiora" kinda thing. She could have a baker's hat, apron,and maybe a dough or flour spot on her cheek. When she uses her ult it could make a cloud of flour, or when she uses any of her attacks some kind of flour smoke animation. That is probably asking for a lot though, but the baguette sword and baker's attire would be awesome. Please consider it!

replies.body: She could be in a set with Sinful Succulence Morgana!
Morg, Panth and Fiora would be a great baker group haha

Pantheon NEEDS to get a baker skin first.

{{champion:80}} MY PROFESSION!? Now that you mention it I've always wanted to be a baker. Yes. A baker.

Dream Job Pantheon needs to happen first. And the splash needs to be him flowndering to keep up in Morgana's bakery.
lol true Panth needs a baker skin too
